title: River Raisin National Battlefield Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips There are many options to consider for your River Raisin National Battlefield trip before you determine the best ones for your group. Teachers check if your Monroe County, MI or Wayne County, MI school qualifies for our "Free Ticket to Ride" Scholarship! The Civil War Preservation Trust is also offering a field trip fund to help defray the cost of transportation.  All Field Trips     Curriculum Materials Make the War of 1812 come alive for your students--we have many lesson plans developed by teachers for you, check it out!! All Curriculum Materials
